name: Helium (itch)
description:
Helium is a demake of Nitrome's flash game series Hot Air.

There are four stages, each with its own unique obstacle. The player's goal is to collect all flowers in a stage, instead of reaching a goal. The number of flowers remaining is indicated by a number on the tope left corner of the screen

CONTROLS

Moving the balloon is done my moving the mouse (the cursor is shown as a propeller) and clicking (or tapping) to push the balloon in any direction
